name: Building regulations: getting energy conservation and ventilation right
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Energy conservation and ventilation need to be considered in tandem if healthy indoor air quality is to be achieved. This session looks at how to reduce the energy needs of a domestic property whilst at the same time ensuring the building is still ventilated for comfort and health.

presentations.name: Where have we been - where are we going?
presentations.speakers: Nick Jones, Technical Director for Refurbishment, The BRE Group

presentations.name: Energy conservation vs indoor air quality
presentations.speakers: Lynne Sullivan, Architect & Co-founding Partner, SustainableBYDesign

presentations.name: Getting ventilation right
presentations.speakers: Andrew Parr, MVHR Technical & Development Manager, Green Building Store

presentations.name: Low energy design principles, form and function
presentations.speakers: Sally Godber, Partner, WARM: Low energy buildings practice
